channel.title: Remi Forax's Blog
channel.description: Java, the JVM and stuff around

item.title: Java8 in 8 methods
item.description: Trying to summarize all the novelties of Java 8 is pretty hard, obviously you have the introduction of lambdas, but there are dozens of little gems just waiting you, in this post, i will try to summarize Java 8 in 8 new useful methods.

item.title: the selector pattern
item.description: Fun with functional Programming in Java Java 8 introduces functional interface (function type) and lambda (anonymous function) to Java making Java effectively a kind of functional language.
